answers.answer:
Decentralized Education Framework â€“ The platform is built on open-source blockchain technologies, such as Solana and zkPass, allowing developers to contribute, fork, and enhance its educational framework.

Open-Source Smart Contracts â€“ Decentraclasses utilizes and contributes to open-source Solidity smart contracts for features like credential verification, NFT-based certifications, and decentralized course access. By making these contracts available, other projects can build upon them.

Web3 Authentication & Decentralized Identity â€“ By integrating open-source tools like Solana Wallet Adapter, Web3Auth, and Gateway Protocol, Decentraclasses enhances Web3 authentication methods in education, paving the way for interoperable identity solutions.

zkPass for Private Credential Verification â€“ The project pioneers the integration of zkPass for verifying off-chain educational credentials securely on-chain. This expands the OSS ecosystem by demonstrating practical zk applications and contributing code for others to adopt.

Interoperable On-Chain Achievements â€“ Decentraclasses allows users to create public, verifiable profiles of their educational achievements using blockchain. This promotes the adoption of decentralized identity standards in education and beyond.

Community Collaboration & Open Governance â€“ The platform encourages open collaboration, allowing educators, developers, and learners to contribute to its development through repositories, proposals, and governance models
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer:
Decentralized Course Platform
Educators can create and offer courses directly on-chain.
Learners enroll in courses without intermediaries, reducing costs.
Smart contracts handle payments and course access.
2. Blockchain-Based Credential Verification
Certificates and achievements are issued as NFTs or Soulbound Tokens (SBTs).
zkPass integration enables privacy-preserving credential verification from external platforms like Coursera or Udemy.
Employers and institutions can verify credentials without needing third-party confirmation.
3. On-Chain Educational Identity
Users build a decentralized, tamper-proof profile showcasing their achievements, skills, and certifications.
This profile can be used across different platforms, reducing reliance on centralized resume systems like LinkedIn.
4. Secure & Transparent Learning History
All course completions, assessments, and issued credentials are immutably stored on the blockchain.
Learners have full ownership and control over their data.
5. Tokenized Incentives & Rewards
Students and educators earn tokenized rewards for participation and achievements.
Gamification elements (badges, leaderboards, etc.) increase engagement.
6. Decentralized Exam Proctoring & Anti-Cheating Mechanisms
zkPass ensures secure, private verification for online exams.
Plagiarism prevention tools ensure academic integrity.
7. Open Education Marketplace
Anyone can list and monetize educational content via smart contracts.
Cross-chain compatibility allows seamless transactions across multiple blockchains.
8. Web3 Authentication & Access Control
Users log in using decentralized wallets (e.g., Solana Wallet Adapter, Web3Auth).
Social login integration (via Particle or Web3Auth) enables easy onboarding for non-crypto-native users.
How Decentraclasses is Differentiated?
âœ… Decentralized & Open â€“ Unlike traditional education platforms, Decentraclasses eliminates central control, enabling fair access and reducing censorship.

âœ… Verifiable & Portable Credentials â€“ Unlike LinkedIn or centralized learning platforms, Decentraclasses ensures that certificates cannot be faked or revoked by a single entity.

âœ… Privacy-Preserving Verification â€“ Unlike public blockchains where all data is visible, zkPass ensures selective disclosure, maintaining data privacy.

âœ… Ownership & Monetization for Educators â€“ Unlike Udemy or Coursera, where platforms take a cut, Decentraclasses enables direct monetization via smart contracts with minimal fees.

âœ… Interoperability & Web3 Native â€“ Integrates with NFT standards, DeFi protocols, and identity systems, making learning credentials usable across multiple dApps and metaverse platforms.
answers.question: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?

answers.answer:
Enhancing zkPass Integration for Credential Verification
ðŸ”¹ Goal: Improve the verification of off-chain credentials (e.g., Coursera, Udemy) using zkPass for private, on-chain validation.
ðŸ”¹ How Funds Will Be Used:

Develop a seamless user interface for uploading and verifying certificates.
Expand integrations with other education platforms for broader credential coverage.
2. Building a Decentralized On-Chain Learning Profile
ðŸ”¹ Goal: Create a verifiable, portable educational resume where users can store achievements, certifications, and learning history.
ðŸ”¹ How Funds Will Be Used:

Develop smart contracts to store learning achievements as NFTs or SBTs.
Implement an intuitive dashboard for users to manage and share their profiles.
3. Decentralized Exam Proctoring & Anti-Cheating Mechanisms
ðŸ”¹ Goal: Ensure fair assessments using zkPass and blockchain-based tracking.
ðŸ”¹ How Funds Will Be Used:

Research and develop zk-SNARK-based proctoring for online exams.
Implement plagiarism detection using decentralized AI models.
4. Expanding Multi-Chain Support
ðŸ”¹ Goal: Enable users from different blockchain ecosystems to interact with Decentraclasses.
ðŸ”¹ How Funds Will Be Used:

Integrate with Ethereum, Polygon, and Filecoin for storage and interoperability.
Develop cross-chain credential verification for users across multiple networks.
5. Improving the Open-Source Ecosystem & Developer Tooling
ðŸ”¹ Goal: Make it easier for developers to contribute and build on Decentraclasses.
ðŸ”¹ How Funds Will Be Used:

Develop SDKs & APIs for easy integration into other education-focused dApps.
Launch open-source grant programs and bounties to incentivize development.
6. UI/UX Improvements for Mainstream Adoption
ðŸ”¹ Goal: Make Web3 education accessible to non-technical users.
ðŸ”¹ How Funds Will Be Used:

Enhance onboarding with Web3Auth social login options.
Optimize mobile compatibility for broader accessibility.
Grant Fund Allocation Breakdown ðŸ’°
âœ… 40% - Development & Engineering (Smart contracts, zkPass, credential storage)
âœ… 20% - Security & Audits (Smart contract audits, privacy testing)
âœ… 15% - Community Growth & Developer Grants (Open-source contributions, education)
âœ… 15% - UI/UX Design & Platform Optimization
âœ… 10% - Marketing & User Acquisition (Hackathons, partnerships, outreach)
answers.question: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]â€”for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Decentraclasses
project.description:
**Decentraclasses is India's Learn-to-Earn ed-tech Platform with staking.** Our main motto is to make education courses an asset and decentralize education so everyone can Learn-to-Earn and monetize the learnings by staking their own courses.

Decentraclasses is a decentralized ed-tech platform in India that aims to decentralize education and empower learners to monetize their knowledge through staking in their own courses. By bridging the gap between web2 and web3 awareness, providing **mentorships, and career support, and offering tradable courses with lifelong incentives**, Decentraclasses enables individuals to learn, earn, and test their skills in a decentralized manner, fostering a more inclusive and rewarding learning experience.

Support us ðŸ’ª and We'll give out exclusive rewards for early supporters and with amazing use cases. ðŸ”¥

You can find more information about **Decentraclasses** on their socials at https://bento.me/decentraclasses.
